definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: Torreya grandis Merrillii is tertiary relict plant, and is a precious economic species peculiar in China.
sentences.chinese: 香榧系第三紀孑遺植物，爲我國特有的珍貴經濟樹種。

sentences.english: Podocarpus neriifolius is an ancient subtropical relict flora species.
sentences.chinese: 百日青是南亞熱帶區系古老的孑遺樹種。
